description: Egg roll wrapper stuffed with egg roll fillings (no meat). Served with sweet and sour sauce
Special seasoned tofu, deep-fried served with Thai sweet chili sauce with crush peanut
Special battered calamari with special seasoning and served with Thai sweet chili sauce
Combination of fish filet mixed with special curry paste, spices and green bean, deep-fried served with Thai sweet chili sauce with crush peanuts and cucumber salad.
Thai-style dumpling stuffed with minced pork, shrimp and onion served with Sweet garlic/ginger sauce
